creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Add an section "Live Sites" as it exists for Cocoon 
(http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/link/livesites.html)

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
There is a tiny but important typo in the link:

It should be
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/community/live-sites.html
instead of
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/community/live.sites.html

(I have increased severity and priority because this now is a highly visible 
bug on the website.)

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: fixed, should be deployed any minute now

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Unfortunately the link is still wrong.

(Please only change the Status to Resolved when a problem is really (re-)
solved.)

One of the first things a visitor of http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya will try is 
the "Live Sites" link.

Unfortunately the link is still wrong and results in a 404 error.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
No, it still does not work.

The problem is the "Live Sites" link on the "Project Information" page. 
The "Live Sites" link on the "Community" page works. The difference is 
between "live-sites.html" (good) and "live.sites.html" (bad).
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
egli@apache.org
text:
Hmm, yes I see. However the link is only wrong if you are on
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/. It is correct if you check
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/project/index.html and
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/community/index.html. Where is this difference
coming from?

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I realigned the content of the summary with the remaining problem.

The problem should be resolved for 1.2 due to the expected number of new 
website visitors after the release of 1.2.
